title: STEM Excellence Scholarship
description: Scholarship for outstanding students pursuing STEM fields, rewarding academic excellence and innovation.
requirements: GPA 3.5+ in STEM major, active in research or projects

title: Arts Creativity Scholarship
description: Award for students excelling in creative arts, including painting, music, and performing arts.
requirements: Portfolio submission required, active participation in arts events

title: Leadership Development Grant
description: Supports students showing leadership skills in academics, community service, or student organizations.
requirements: Evidence of leadership roles, recommendation letter

title: Sports Achievement Scholarship
description: Awarded to students with notable achievements in sports at the regional or national level.
requirements: Participation in state/national competitions, recommendation from coach

title: Women in Technology Scholarship
description: Encourages female students to pursue careers in technology and computer science.
requirements: Female student, enrollment in tech-related degree, passion for innovation
